/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and shops, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the scene. Cars and buses traverse the road, weaving their way through the city's arteries. The sky above is a clear blue, casting a serene backdrop to the dynamic cityscape below.
